notes.text:
This update for ovmf fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-14584: Fixed a null dereference in AuthenticodeVerify() (bsc#1177789).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Null pointer dereference in Tianocore EDK2 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
